Reviews.Title: Good For the Price
Reviews.Author: William A. Smyly
Reviews.Content: SHORT VERSION:Working Pocket Camera for a low price, I would recommend this camera (especially if you are looking for a cheap digital camera). I would not purchase this camera to take on your honeymoon or a spring break adventure. It is not waterproof and doesn't seem very durable compared to other pocket cameras.Still the camera works great.LONG VERSION:I've owned around 30 digital cameras from all different brands including: Nikon, Canon, Sony , Panasonic, Konica-Minolta. I use the Canon rebel series cameras the most, but like to have a pocket camera from time to time. I have stuck with mostly Canon cameras over the last 7 years. Nothing against any other company, I just have liked using Cannon. I take daily photographs for a children's summer camp for 11 weeks out of the year. I'm rough on cameras and usually get around 3 years or less out of most of my Canon Rebel Series cameras... but that is not what I am reviewing today....I haven't bought a Sony camera in about 7 years or so - the last one was a Sony Cyber-Shot DSC-H5, which is 7.2 Mega pixel camera and not really a true pocket camera due to it's size....Sony Cybershot DSC-H5 7.2MP Digital Camera with 12x Optical Image Stabilization ZoomAnyway, I wasn't expecting much from this lightning deal camera, but for the price I decided to give it a try. I've only played around with this for a day, so I may update this review later on. (If I don't, assume I'm still pleased with this camera)FIRST IMPRESSION:When I first held the DSC-W670 I thought I had gotten what I paid for in a cheap camera. The plastic seems a little thinner than most cameras and it didn't feel very solid. When you press on the case you can hear the plastic "creak" as it bends and flexes. (Not saying this is flimsy - just slightly less solid than most) So I don't know how well this will hold up, given my track record of being rough on cameras.WHAT IS SO GREAT ABOUT POCKET CAMERAS?The one thing that can make or break a pocket camera is all the "bells & whistles" Some of these cameras have come up with cool gimmicks and even some useful tools so that any "idiot" can get some great shots.I played around with a few of the features of the DSC-W670 I haven't really used much before on a pocket camera. The 1st was the panorama picture setting - this feature has been out for a while on a lot of the pocket cams and is a cool gimmick. I guess I won't have to use the auto-stitch feature in Photoshop as much now.... The panorama setting works well on the DSC-W670. There are 3 settings: 360 degree photo, wide (which seems to be a little over 180 degrees) and standard panorama (which seems to be a little greater than 90 to 100 degrees).To take a panoramic photo, just toggle the camera to that setting using a 3 position switch on the side - use the menu button to select the size and then follow the on screen instructions to show you how to sweep your camera to the right. It tells you when to stop...The other feature that I thought was cool, that I had not used before, was the `Smile Shutter" option. To activate this setting while in normal photo mode, press the button with the smiley face. The camera places a box around any detected faces. When the subject smiles, you will see a meter bar fill up on the left side of the LCD screen, and when the bar reaches the set level the camera automatically takes a photo for you (You never have to press any buttons). The default level is mid range and the subject needs to show some teeth in the smile to activate the camera to take the picture. So if you are trying to use this on someone who gives you a half smile, you will need to adjust the settings or be good at telling jokes....This feature is a true gimmick feature - I don't know that I would actually use this feature a lot myself. We did test it as an alternative to using a timer for group shots. It took a few tries to get it to go off, but it did work.Everyone was laughing at me as we tested this. I said, "Ok everyone, come over here and don't smile at the camera, I want to get a group shot." Once everyone was set finally I said, "One, two, three ... SMILE" and we waited and nothing happened... "Ok try again, normal faces everyone... ok now 1,2,3 Smile!" The camera snapped a photo on that attempt.I remember every Christmas growing up, we got a great shot of my uncle walking to get in the picture and was caught by the timer going off before he was set in place.... Might give this a try this year. I have a large family and this feature seems to work better when a little closer to the subject and when fewer people are in the frame... So I'm not going to expect too much, but if it works I'll come back and let you know.ONE PROBLEM:The only problem I have had with this camera is in the door to the battery and memory card compartment. It is spring-loaded like most of these cameras and has a lock that you slide to allow the door to open. In order to open my camera's battery compartment, I have to move the switch to the open position and then tap the camera in my palm to get the door to swing open. I think it is designed to open automatically, yet mine gets hung up almost every time. I've only had it pop open (like it should) a handful of times while testing it. There is nothing to grip to pull the door open, you just have to tap and shake it until it opens. I might just have a defective door. It was a cheap camera and I can live with this, so I'm not going to waste any time calling customer service or returning the camera. Although, this leads me to believe that the door may be the first thing to break on this camera. (remember, I said I'm rough on cameras...)The battery has it's own lock inside the compartment, so it isn't pushing against the door like some of the other pocket cameras I've had. (Which I think is a good thing!) If you've bought and used several pocket cameras over the last few years, I'm sure you've had at least one with a battery door issue. I've got another camera that has the battery compartment held closed with a piece of duct tape.FINAL THOUGHT:A good pocket camera for the price. I wasn't expecting much and was pleasantly surprised at how well this camera works. Sometimes when a deal is too good to be true, there is a reason. I think this camera is truly a good deal. It is not as good as any of the $200+ pocket cameras, but I would have still been satisfied with this camera if I had paid as much as $140 for it.If you are thinking about buying one of these cameras and you have any question or things you want me to test out first - just let me know and I'll try to help.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Photos from this little baby!
Reviews.Author: Reads on Planes
Reviews.Content: I got this camera specifically to replace an old one and in anticipation of an international trip that would take us out of the country for three weeks ..... thru Greece, Turkey and Cyprus.  Yes, very historical and photo worthy places!  This was the ONLY camera we used and we shot over 800 photos.  All but two were perfect - and the two that weren't were not the fault of the camera but of the operators......The battery held up well - we charged it only once a day and only with heavy use.  The videos also came out well - better if you have a tripod but there is decent stabilization built in.  Get extra memory cards if you want to take a lot of photos (over 1000) and can't download and reformat between shootings.

Reviews.Title: Not the greatest...not the worst
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: I'm not a camera geek & prefer to use point & shoot cameras. I've been using my daughter's Cybershot DSC-W50, but she'll be moving out soon so I decided to purchase this Cybershot for myself. It was a $79 lightning deal. So for the price point this is a good camera.I haven't printed any photos yet, but have added them to my laptop & the web. The LCD screen is grainy & bothers me, but the photos have been okay. The flash seems to be overly bright, but does a great job of taking pics in a low light area. Most of my early pics were taken at night with low lighting. (update-I just discovered that the LCD screen is grainy because it's the default setting which saves battery life. To change Disp. Resolution, choose MENU, scroll to the Toolbox icon)A few settings are easy to access, many more are accessed by using the menu button & scrolling through the various options.Several memory cards can be used. Here's a list of the ones that will take still images, as well as, video:Memory Stick PRO Duo Mark2Memory Stick PRO-HG DuoMemory Stick Micro (M2) Mark2each of these need to be Class 4 or faster: SD memory card, SDHC memory card, microSD memory card, & microSDHC memory cardThere is approx. 56MB on internal memoryThere is an on-screen help manual.This camera does not have the Carl Zeiss lens.I uploaded a few photos that were taken in low light situations using the automatic setting.I purchased the Case Logic DCB-302 Compact  Case for Camera - Black which has room for the camera, USB cord, battery & extra memory card.  One thing I've noticed is that my camera has turned on a couple times while in this case. I searched for a hard case, but wanted more room so I decided on this one.Battery life doesn't seem to be as good as my daughter's Cybershot. I haven't used my camera much and fully charged it after I took the first few pics - the battery appears to be down by 1/2 already.I will update my review when I try the Panorama feature & as I continue to use the camera.UPDATE:Macro seems to be part of the auto setting. From what I can tell, it can't be set manually. I did a little research on macro and learned that the minimum distance macro kicks in will vary by camera. The auto macro setting for this camera is designated by a flower icon & doesn't appear when I think it should & it blinks off easily. I have to experiment with minimum distance until the flower icon shows up. This frustrates me.  Remember I'm not a camera geek so maybe it's user error on my part.I also want to mention that this camera seems to take longer to focus than I'm used to.And, finally, I suggest that you purchase at least one spare battery because the battery doesn't hold its charge very long.

Reviews.Title: Cheap Camera
Reviews.Author: JamesB
Reviews.Content: You get what you pay for! This camera is not what I hoped it would be. Disappointed with SONY on this item.

Reviews.Title: Easy to carry
Reviews.Author: E. Humphrey
Reviews.Content: This camera was purchased to be carried in a small purse.  It serves that purpose well but like so many of it's kind could use a view finder.  Looking at the screen in the sun can cancel out the viewing area and you have no idea where you are aiming.  The button to take the picture isn't the easiest that I have used.  I do like the zoom and the picture quality is fine.  It is small enough that I can carry it in a small purse but for my more serious photography I prefer my mid-size camera.

Reviews.Title: Not a Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Gary A. Kramer
Reviews.Content: Sent it back it wouldn't communicate with my laptop. Sony told me this camera is sold only in Latin America and Canada.Why did they send it to Amazon ??

Reviews.Title: Too "intelligent"
Reviews.Author: brainmist
Reviews.Content: This product seems designed to make photography simple, by deciding for you what settings to implement.  Unfortunately, its decisions produced over-illuminated low-light shots, and mistimed shots as it waited for a subject to smile.  It may be the right camera for some, but I had more difficulty getting a good shot out of it than with my previous cameras, or even my cell phone.Thankfully, Amazon does returns with no quibbling.

Reviews.Title: Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Rachel Green
Reviews.Content: This is a Christmas present for someone. I love the fact that this company ships VERY fast! The camera is very nnice in size and is light weight. i am a photographer and have been playing with it :) Wel will see after they get just how they like it!

Reviews.Title: Beware of Poor Camera
Reviews.Author: rkassl
Reviews.Content: I am extremely disappointed with this purchase.  Worst pictures, all seem to be over exposed.  Super slow shutter speed.  Zoom is very poor too.

Reviews.Title: disappointing
Reviews.Author: R. Sanguinetti "VGBI"
Reviews.Content: don't like the quality of the photos. in the panoramic view, you can't see nothing: not the faces, nor the people, nor the scenery. very disappointed. i would not reccomend it. prefer nikon BY FAR. besides, i strongly dislike the i on battery

Reviews.Title: Good while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Tomas Goodwin
Reviews.Content: The camera worked well for several months, then the flimsy back cover holding the sd card and battery fell off.  Shortly after that it just stopped working completely.

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: samycto
Reviews.Content: For the amount of money you will be spending on this camera, you will get the quality that is neither here nor there.This camera is not terrible, but neither is it fantastic. From my personal opinion, sometimes an iphone 5 can take better pictures that this cam. Night shots, quick shots, all the things you might want to have a clear picture, will turn out not so sharp. Pictures during the day are alright, but you'll see the bad side if you blow it up on your laptop or TV. Generally, pictures are below average quality.If you are looking to buy one for your kid, or just one that you don't mind having it trashed, this is a quick fix.

Reviews.Title: It's Good
Reviews.Author: VeronicaGraterol
Reviews.Content: It's easy to use, it's so good with a great definition, i like take photos with this cause everything looks so good, it's good in the day and the night, this camera takes soo amazing pictures

Reviews.Title: Useful as a paper weight
Reviews.Author: Philip Jones "Philip J"
Reviews.Content: I bought this in December and never actually used it.  Charged the battery today and it will not turn on.  Sony support's diagnosis is that it broke and needs fixing.  Somehow it was broken sitting in a drawer for six months.  I will never buy a Sony product again.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Bennett
Reviews.Content: This camera is great! Small, light, takes good pictures and the purchase experience was good as well.I carry this easily in my purse so I can take pictures anytime I want!Overall an excellent experience and very glad I made the decision to buy

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend the store, dutiful faithful than it delivers so should be all storesRecomiendo ampliamente la tienda, fiel cumplidora de lo que ofrece asi deberian ser todas las tiendas

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Lorenzo Gonzalez Flores
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for the price. I have some months with it and it is still working very, very good. I'm only dissapointed with some pictures taken at night in the house, because those photos don't have a good quality ( I have another camera "nikon" and it take those photos better), but the other kinds of photos are excelent!

Reviews.Title: Very bad!
Reviews.Author: Mohammad Abouelreesh Hassan
Reviews.Content: very bad camera, gives shaky pictures and difficult to get nice pictures using it. I hate sony camera and do not recommend to any one :(

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Gina G "ggardner969"
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera but as others have said, the compartment for the battery does pop open on occasion.  Funny thing is, sometimes when I want it to open, no bueno.  Eventually I get it open but it can be a bit irritating.

Reviews.Title: broke quickley
Reviews.Author: Brenda C. Hendricks "Brenda in The Villages"
Reviews.Content: This was an easy camera to use but it locked up almost immediately and would not close . I sent it back for a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Defective
Reviews.Author: ChrisMac12
Reviews.Content: The unit i recieved must have been defective.  I first used it on 1 Jan 13 and it worked great.  I took video, still photos and panoramics.  I let it sit for about a 6 weeks and  used it again mid Feb on a hiking trip.  The camera wouldn't even power on.  I tested it the night before, and the battery showed half charge, so i just let it go thinking it would be enough.So, after the hike, i tried to charge it up.  With the battery in the wall charger, the light kept blinking orange.  After finessing it for awhile, i finally got it to stay lit (which means it's charging)I put the battery back in the camera and tried a few still shots.  It would only take about every 5th time i pressed the button.  I tried video mode, when i hit the record button, the camera would cycle like it was doing something, then the screen would just go black and power down without retracting the lens.  I'd have to power it back on, then power it off to get the lens to close.A little disappointed, i've never had problems with sony items before.  I think it was just a defective unit.Amazon's customer service was awesome, and they did allow me to get a refund.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: Melinda Foster
Reviews.Content: Photos are amazing! I've yet to take a 360* panorama photo but I like the idea that I can. It takes amazing photos in light and dark areas.

Reviews.Title: Too tiny
Reviews.Author: LAUREL
Reviews.Content: Anyone over 50 will find this camera annoying small. It's so tiny that you cannot see/feel separate parts of the operating features, much less read the indications as to what they are!

Reviews.Title: Excellent article
Reviews.Author: Alexander Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: An article of top quality and utility... An article of top quality and utility... and easy to use with quality materials for life and 100% recommended ...

Reviews.Title: SONY DOES NOT CARRY THIS MODEL
Reviews.Author: Gene Irasusta
Reviews.Content: When I went to Sony's Site, they don't have this Model under DSC-W.  I wonder if this is Legit or imitation product?  It lacks a very important feature which is RECHARGING THE BATTERY WITHOUT TAKING IT OUT OF THE UNIT.  I'm not impressed with this item.  I wish I could return it or exchange for a better one.

Reviews.Title: that cheap
Reviews.Author: em
Reviews.Content: i like the prizes is cheap to another camera, a hope work fine, thanks for all, the color look pretty and model, just right for me.

Reviews.Title: camera rating
Reviews.Author: George Pepek
Reviews.Content: I took camera on a trip and it didn't preform anything like my Canon camera. It seemed hard to get it to focus and no matter how I used it the quality of pictures was not what I expected it to be.Light problems and focus problems.  I am wondering if there is something wrong with the camera. I tried all the different settings per the manual and am not satisified with the quality of the pictures. Is there a way to return this product and have it checked or return it and buy a different camera? I replaced a kodak camera, 6 mega pix.with this Sony 16 Mega pix. and the Kodak camera took much better pictures and I never had a problem with focus or light. What can I do?

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: Julie Pulec
Reviews.Content: Just like I thought it would be!  Awesome camera for nearly half the price!  Love the 360-panoramic shot.  Works great!

Reviews.Title: According
Reviews.Author: milagros cuevas
Reviews.Content: Certainly not what I thought ... But it has its virtues ... light, and good design practiceCertainly not what I thought

Reviews.Title: I like my cybershot Camera
Reviews.Author: Mary S. Legg
Reviews.Content: I am quite pleased with the Cybershot camera that I purchased I really like the size of it, it fits into my purse or pocket and the quality of the pictures so far have been wonderful

Reviews.Title: Okay.
Reviews.Author: Elle
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera before Christmas, thinking I'd replace an old Coolpix L20 that I've used for several years.  I was anticipating an improvement in indoor and low-light pictures because of progress in digital technology.  I am disappointed with the camera..  The picture appears to darken slightly at the edges, which affects landscape pictures, and while it does okay on indoor pictures, it does not have the clarity I was hoping for.  Colors are much more intense with my Coolpix; wiith the Sony, the picture is there but there is no impact.  In landscape pictures, the fantastic, varied shades of color in the sky become.....blue.I'm going to continue playing with this camera-some of my disappointment may be from operator ignorance-but for now, I'm very unhappy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Good for the money
Reviews.Author: John Knollovic
Reviews.Content: Havent had any issues at all with the camera. Someone else said the battery door flips open all the time, thats never happened to me once. The only minor thing that bugs me is the bar that you push down on to shoot is the same bar as the power button, only seperated by a very small notch. This has led to many cases of fat fingering the power off while im trying to shoot a picture.Thats it, thats the only negative thing i can think of about this camera. It is the best thing in the price range, it works good, battery life is good, videos are good, picture quality is good. Love it. Would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: 3M Post-It TRIDEX - Triangular Index Flag Dis...
Reviews.Content: Best Price.. best result.. handy and carry in pocket .. best video Quality and photo are great Thanks Paresh patel

Reviews.Title: Slim
Reviews.Author: Cole Knighton "Indyrxl"
Reviews.Content: This is a great slim camera you can toss in anywhere.  I picked it up for my wife so she can have it in the diaper bag or purse or where ever she wants it quickly and easily.  So far it has worked perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Angel Mauricio Regalado Paspuel
Reviews.Content: Good product  it was good packing,the picture looks very siimilar to the product,the price was good too . . .

Reviews.Title: like it
Reviews.Author: aafull
Reviews.Content: sometimes you have to take a 2nd picture to get a good one. If your using it just to capture good times and memories it is definitely worth the money. Easy to use. just a tip for anyone who buys this spend a few extra dollars and buy a SONY brand memory card. for what ever reason the processing time between pictures is much quicker, from about 8 sec. to about 2 sec. I would definitely chose this camera again if I were shopping for another.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: WILL VALLON
Reviews.Content: I like it, the pictures are nice. I have not printed out any pic yet but the image on my PC are fine to me.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot
Reviews.Author: dtb "internet shopaholic"
Reviews.Content: i haven't used it much since i got it, but what i have used it for it has taken great pictures.  the rechargeable battery seems to have a good shelf life and good use life.

Reviews.Title: to easy to damage
Reviews.Author: Ed
Reviews.Content: not a bad camera it just wont last too long as far as use. The way it was designed the view screen is easily damaged and there is no view hole to help u take a snap shot if it is damaged

Reviews.Title: GREAT PRICE- EXCELLENT ALL AROUND DIGITAL CAMERA
Reviews.Author: billy johnson
Reviews.Content: THIS WAS A GIFT FOR MY WIFE SINCE HER LAST ONE MYSTERIOUSLY DISAPPEARED AFTER MY SISTER "BORROWED" IT... ANYWAY, I LOVE MOST ANYTHING SONY MAKES AND IT WAS A GREAT PRICE. THE QUALITY IS AS GOOD AS IT GETS IN MY OPINION... WHICH IS THE ONLY ONE THAT MATTERS... EXCEPT FOR MY WIFE, AND SHE LOVES IT AS WELL. IT GOT ME THE RESPONSE I WAS LOOKING FOR FROM MY "HONEY" - I SHOPPED AROUND AND READ A LOT OF REVIEWS AND EVEN CONSUMERS DIGEST AGRESS YOU REALLY CANT BEAT THIS CAMERA FOR THE QUALITY AT A GREAT PRICE - THANKS!!

Reviews.Title: da_:galban
Reviews.Author: David Galban
Reviews.Content: I recommend it 100% serious, andresponsible, the product arrived just the wayspecification, which is a wine ifspot on the screen that was what Ipleasure, the phone is in good working

Reviews.Title: good purchase
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Pacheco
Reviews.Content: It is an excelent product.It is worth the purchase.I would recomend this one for everybody.Let's keep buying

Reviews.Title: BUEN PRODUCTO
Reviews.Author: Moicam.
Reviews.Content: La camara es muy buena, es compacta y ligera... se vé que es resistente y de buena calidad... buena pantalla y de facil uso.... recomiendo a este vendedor... el envio al casillero fue rapido.

Reviews.Title: Excelent
Reviews.Author: Carlos D. Torres A.
Reviews.Content: Me encanta este producto porque lleno mis espectativas. Gracias por los servicios prestados. Me encantaria que agruparan un poco mas los pedidos.

Reviews.Title: Great value, battery hog
Reviews.Author: Hartej P. Singh "QBProfessor"
Reviews.Content: Pros: Very compact, good quality photosCons: Battery discharges very quickly. Unlike most cameras where you put it down and pick up when needed, if you do not put your battery in the charger, you are going to regret it. One shot, and it dies.

Reviews.Title: need to work with it.
Reviews.Author: Patricia MacLachlan
Reviews.Content: The camera was easy to use and was a good value, it was an excellent Christmas gift for a non technical user.

Reviews.Title: Genial
Reviews.Author: VE64880 Jesus
Reviews.Content: Excelente camara, buena resolucion y envio 100% confiable, tal cual como la publicacion y acepta memorias sd. excelente oferta a

Reviews.Title: Really good camera!!
Reviews.Author: acooper37
Reviews.Content: The picture quality is great, love the video too. It does what I need it to do.  Check it out for a descent price.

Reviews.Title: GRACIAS
Reviews.Author: LUIS RENE RUBIN RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: UN MUY BUEN PRODUCTO, SE LOS RECOMIENDOCUBRE CON TODAS LAS ESPECIFICACIONES TECNICAS DETALLADASENELEQUIPOINTERESANTECOMPRAREALIZADA

Reviews.Title: I like it for $80
Reviews.Author: Manny Lopez
Reviews.Content: My son needed a camera for a school project. I did not want to give him mine nor did I want to spend too much money.  This one seemed like a good deal for $80.  This camera has features found on more expensive cameras.  Its compact size makes it easy to carry around.  The ability to take pictures as well as HD video, in most cases, eliminates the need to also carry a video camera. The camera has several shooting modes to select from; however, he mainly leaves it in Auto mode to let the camera figure out the best settings.  The Sweep Panorama mode is cool, you press the shutter button and sweep the camera from left to right of vice verse and the camera creates a panoramic picture; he uses this to take close up pictures of the board in his classes. Overall, pictures are clear with good color.  The image stabilization helps take sharper photos; I found this especially useful when zooming.  This is a good day to day camera for around town.  It also makes a nice gift as someones first camera.  As for a camera to take on vacation eliminating the need to take an additional video camera, I would look for one with minimum 16 optical zoom and a 1080P HD video(CMOS).

Reviews.Title: Nice Buy!
Reviews.Author: Betty E. Bright
Reviews.Content: This camera took some amazing pictures, colors were sharp and distinct.  Very impressed with the quality and the price.  I will definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: it's Perfect
Reviews.Author: Rene Antonio Marquez Martinez
Reviews.Content: really good product and just what i expected, is get on time and is just beautiful and original botton line i love it

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: downsouthgagirl
Reviews.Content: I haven't had a digital camera in a while, so comparing this to my 10mp camera, it takes amazing photos. I'm upgrading from my basic webcam and these photos show every minor detail.(You can literally see each hair follicle in my eyebrows, for example, or peach fuzz on someone's face). The camera modes such as color pop are fun and a great way to save time on photo editing. The downside to having a camera that records in HD is going to be file size, but I'm very satisfied with my purchase thus far.

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Barb Handschumacher
Reviews.Content: Excellent item - easy to use - quick ship. Christmas present to myself - very  happy!!  Excellent photo quality and easy to transfer to computer.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: A team pretty convenient and very good quality. A very guaranteed brand and therefore reliable. Easy to use and easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Muy buena cámara (para el precio)
Reviews.Author: Carlos Cedillo
Reviews.Content: Esta cámara fue adquirida en una oferta especial, por lo cual la relación calidad/costo fue insuperable. La cámara cumple con todo aquello que promete el fabricante.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: Isabel "Threadhen"
Reviews.Content: When our old camera went into cardiac arrest, we already knew we liked the Sony CyberShot our daughter-in-law has.  We like the face feature, the ease of charging, the sharp quality of the photos.  We'd recommend it to anyone who wants a decent camera.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Frank Lopez
Reviews.Content: if completely fulfilled my expectations, and I go back to place another order for future purchases with these excellent merchandise

Reviews.Title: Super for less price
Reviews.Author: ABC
Reviews.Content: I choose this product becaue of quality and price, it is best for cheap price and sony quality is awesome.amazon provided good deal and quality and devliry of Amazon.com is super

Reviews.Title: Another great product from Sony
Reviews.Author: Paul Schweitzer
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent camera!  Once I figured out how to operate it, it has been great!  The photos are super and clear.

Reviews.Title: Pleased
Reviews.Author: J Criswell
Reviews.Content: We are pleased with size and quality of camera. Great to pack into carry on luggage, not bulky. Great deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Excelente camara
Reviews.Author: Ivan Villamar
Reviews.Content: Muy buena cámara, excelente definición y a un muy buen precio. Facil de utilizar y manipular (tamaño estupendo) y lo mejor me llegó sin ningún tipo de problemas.

Reviews.Title: poor picture quality
Reviews.Author: Brenda K Hardy
Reviews.Content: The battery compartment always flies open when preparing to use camera, interfering with picture-taken, causing missed shots.....needs better secure closure

Reviews.Title: Sony camera
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: for the for the puce seems like it would be a good camera for travel..... will tell friends and family

Reviews.Title: Great price!
Reviews.Author: M. J. Trepanier
Reviews.Content: I got it on the "deal of the day" & the price was great. My 4mp had just died & this one is 16.1. I especially like the 6x optical zoom & the 360* picture capability. I really haven't used it enough to give a good review.

Reviews.Title: Perfect camera
Reviews.Author: C. Farrugia
Reviews.Content: My wife is a semi pro photographer. But when she wants a point and shoot she demands Sony. No other camera compares. Very crisp photos. No blurs. A home run.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: Cesar
Reviews.Content: produto bem embalado boa qualidade, novo sem defeitos que e importante e prazo de entrega reduzido quero voltar a comprar

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Theresa Kemper
Reviews.Content: Was not aware I needed a memory card and did not purchase one so we have not really used it yet

ProductInfo.Features:
16.1MP resolution
6X optical zoom
2.7 inch LCD screen
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-W670/B 16.1MP Cybershot Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD Screen (Black)
